name: Transformers Fall of Cybertron
description: My first platinum. I practiced my English by playing multiplayer. Good game, LET THE REMASTERED VERSION OUT!

name: Sherlock Holmes Crimes and Punishments
description: It was a gift for my dad but the first case didn't even happen.

name: Call of Duty Black Ops 2
description: Good times with my brother in online multiplayer, bad times with my sister when she used the internet. Good story and secrets, predicted what 2025 would be like O.M.G.

name: Destiny
description: Good times, I finished two rounds by myself (3 vs AI game mode).

name: GTA V
description: Good and bad moments in Online mode, craziness and crews, very toxic.

name: Need for Speed Rivals
description: Driving non-stop, I fell in love with the Ferrari F12 Berlinetta.

name: GTA IV
description: It was good, the online not much, many secrets that I overlooked.

name: Uncharted 1 Drake's Fortune
description: Good game, the part about the demons in an abandoned Nazi bunker and me alone scared me.

name: Uncharted 2 Among Thieves
description: Good game, many secrets, reach the final boss on the maximum difficulty... Fucking Lazarevic.

name: God of War Collection (1 y 2)
description: Good games, violence and blood on demand, I still remember the combos... Fucking Zeus and Ares.

name: Call of Duty Ghost
description: Underrated, good online games with my brother, to the point where we were only 2 vs 6 or 8, we won in the end.

name: Street Fighter 4
description: Damn final boss, he used all the combos of all the characters, and also in easy mode with Zangief.

name: Call of Duty Advance Warfare
description: The same as the previous ones but more futuristic, more frenetic, double jump, etc.

name: Assassin's Creed III
description: With this game I learned about the history of the independence of the United States of America... more or less

name: The Last of Us
description: This is Cinema. Excellent plot, suspense, terror, good and sad moments, everything. I'm not surprised they made a series of this game.

name: Minecraft
description: I played it a bit on Ps3 and more on PC, but I gave it up after a few months.

name: God of War III
description: Zeus!, your son has returned and brings with him the destruction of Olympus!

name: Call of Duty Black Ops
description: Great piece of game, except that it gets stuck or bugged in a certain cinematic.

name: Resistance 3
description: I've already played it twice, I can't get enough of playing it, now I'm about to get the platinum.

name: Battlefield Hardline
description: Cops and robbers game, eighties-type plot... but it's the same as other FPS war games, shooting the bad guys.

name: DOOM Eternal
description: The most Christian/Catholic game that could have existed, father of FPS. It's a monster movie where YOU are the monster, 10/10.

name: Batman Arkham Asylum
description: It changes the face of superhero games, 10/10, GOTY. A manual on how to create and develop a good superhero game.

name: Batman Arkham City
description: An prison-city full of criminals and psychopats making un chaos in every corner... just another night for Batman.

name: Batman Arkham Knight
description: What should have been the LAST game in the Arkham trilogy, the finishing touch... but then came Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League and Rocksteady screwed up big time.

name: Uncharted 3 Drake's Deception
description: More secrets, another lost city, more about protagonist's past and... an deception.

name: Uncharted 4 A Thief's End
description: An perfect final for an perfect saga and for his main character.

name: Days Gone
description: Good game but with an few of incomplete parts in one of their enviroments, this post-apocalyptic world is coming for you.

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Excellent game, drama, shootings, tensions, cowboys, deceptions, plot twists... makes me want to play it again.

name: Horizon Zero Dawn
description: One of the first games for Play Station 4, good graphics, good creativity and enviroment.

name: Call of Duty Black Ops Cold War
description: The story happens between Black Ops 1 and Black Ops 2, secrets, spies, more than one final (depends on player's decisions).

name: Call of Duty Black Ops III
description: Only good for frenetic online multiplayer and zombies, but the campaing... 5/10.

name: Call of Duty Modern Warfare (2019)
description: An excellent game to reboot the saga, with realistic details and an story to get you out of your chair.

name: Call of Duty Modern Warfare 2 Remastered
description: The game who caused controversy for just one mission, but remember... No Russian.

name: God of War 2018
description: 10/10, GOTY, good soundtrack, good story and moments of nostagia BOY!

name: Just Cause 3
description: An game about explosions, overthrow a dictator, explosions and... explosions.
